profile.name: Fatih Arslan
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Database Sharding & Error Handling Expert | @planetscale
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with a strong passion for systems programming, tooling, and automation. Proficient in Go, Rust, and Python. Experienced in database sharding and error handling.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed a scalable database sharding system using Go, resulting in a 5x increase in performance.
Implemented an error handling framework utilizing the errwrap tool, reducing errors by 30%.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Maintained and improved open-source projects on GitHub.
Developed custom tools for clients using Python, resulting in a 25% increase in productivity.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of several open-source projects, including a popular Rust library.
Improved code quality and documentation for multiple projects.

Error Handling: errwrap: Go tool to wrap and fix errors with the new %w verb directive
